video.title: Transformers Prime
video.synopsis: With the help of three human allies, the Autobots once again protect Earth from the onslaught of the Decepticons and their leader, Megatron.

episodes.synopsis: The Autobots investigate the return of the Decepticons and must account for a group of young humans who become involved in their eons-old conflict.
episodes.title: Darkness Rising: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: When a weak life signal is received from Cliffjumper, the Autobots roll out but are met by Megatron, who has obtained powerful Dark Energon.
episodes.title: Darkness Rising: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Bulkhead is on a mission to rescue Agent Fowler, who has been kidnapped by the Decepticons. Complications arise when Miko secretly tags along.
episodes.title: Darkness Rising: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: Megatron uses the Dark Energon to summon an army of undead warriors to battle Optimus, while the other Autobots launch a high-stakes rescue operation.
episodes.title: Darkness Rising: Part 4

episodes.synopsis: The ultimate showdown unfolds in Earth's orbit as the Decepticons, aided by Megatron's undead army, do battle with the Autobots.
episodes.title: Darkness Rising: Part 5

episodes.synopsis: While Optimus Prime and Bumblebee square off against Skyquake, Starscream encounters challenges to his leadership at every turn.
episodes.title: Masters and Students

episodes.synopsis: Bulkhead, Bumblebee and Ratchet scramble to eliminate a swarm of Scraplets that have invaded Autobot base while Optimus patrols in the Arctic.
episodes.title: Scrapheap

episodes.synopsis: Bulkhead eagerly anticipates a visit from his old friend Wheeljack, but when his buddy arrives things are not as they seem.
episodes.title: Con Job

episodes.synopsis: The Autobots help Agent Fowler transport a hazardous explosive device, but this time they come under attack from more than just the Decepticons.
episodes.title: Convoy

episodes.synopsis: Miko and Bulkhead head to Greece on a field trip to recover an Energon Harvester, and class is in session for new Decepticons Knock Out and Breakdown.
episodes.title: Deus Ex Machina

episodes.synopsis: Jack convinces Bumblebee to help him win a street race, but the action speeds out of control with the arrival of Knock Out.
episodes.title: Speed Metal

episodes.synopsis: Arcee takes Jack along on a seemingly routine mission, but she encounters an archenemy and must face her deepest fears.
episodes.title: Predatory

episodes.synopsis: Optimus Prime becomes infected with a Decepticon plague, and Arcee and Bumblebee must sneak aboard the Decepticon warship to find the cure.
episodes.title: Sick Mind

episodes.synopsis: Megatron remains a fixture inside Bumblebee's mind and manipulates his actions back at Autobot base.
episodes.title: Out of His Head

episodes.synopsis: During a GroundBridge malfunction, the kids find themselves trapped inside an alternate dimension with a reanimated Skyquake.
episodes.title: Shadowzone

episodes.synopsis: The Autobots roll out to rescue Breakdown, the Decepticon who has been abducted by Silas and the sinister agents of MECH.
episodes.title: Operation: Breakdown

episodes.synopsis: Airachnid negotiates a deal with Silas to use MECH to exact revenge against Arcee and Jack.
episodes.title: Crisscross

episodes.synopsis: Arcee and Bulkhead find their efforts to stop a Decepticon mission hampered by a magnetic device.
episodes.title: Metal Attraction

episodes.synopsis: When the Autobots, along with Jack and Miko, fall victim to an Energon mine cave-in, they find themselves trapped with Starscream and Megatron.
episodes.title: Rock Bottom

episodes.synopsis: Airachnid and Starscream team up to retrieve a weapon, but when Starscream is captured, he reveals that he would rather team up with the Autobots.
episodes.title: Partners

episodes.synopsis: When Bulkhead's brain is accidently endowed with the secret formula for synthetic Energon, he becomes a recluse while the Decepticons hunt him down.
episodes.title: T.M.I.

episodes.synopsis: Ratchet injects himself with synthetic Energon, which makes him a menace to the Decepticons, but also to the Autobots and to himself.
episodes.title: Stronger, Faster

episodes.synopsis: Megatron's attempt to fulfill an ancient Cybertronian prophecy results in a hero becoming mortally wounded, then leads to a long-awaited rematch.
episodes.title: One Shall Fall

episodes.synopsis: When Earth becomes plagued by natural disasters, the Autobots come to the horrible realization that Dark Energon is the source of the bizarre events.
episodes.title: One Shall Rise: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Facing the greatest threat to Earth yet, the Autobots team with an unexpected ally.
episodes.title: One Shall Rise: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: As the Autobots do battle at the Earth's core, Jack learns more about Optimus's past on Cybertron.
episodes.title: One Shall Rise: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: When Optimus gets a case of amnesia, Megatron manipulates him into joining the Decepticons.
episodes.title: Orion Pax: Pt. 1

episodes.synopsis: Jack learns that the key to restoring Optimus Prime's memories lies on Cybertron.
episodes.title: Orion Pax: Pt. 2

episodes.synopsis: Optimus begins to rebel against Megatron's commands, and the Autobots devise a risky plan to get their leader back.
episodes.title: Orion Pax: Pt. 3

episodes.synopsis: When Bumblebee loses the ability to convert into vehicle mode, he begins to question his value to the team.
episodes.title: Operation Bumblebee: Pt. 1

episodes.synopsis: Bumblebee discovers that an unlikely alliance of MECH and Starscream is behind his recent woes, and Ratchet faces demons from his Cybertronian past.
episodes.title: Operation Bumblebee: Pt. 2

episodes.synopsis: Wheeljack returns to Earth in pursuit of a new Decepticon, but Optimus finds the rogue Autobot's operating style to be incompatible with his own.
episodes.title: Loose Cannons

episodes.synopsis: Airachnid and Starscream struggle for control over an Insecticon warrior, and the Decepticon ranks splinter after the loss of a key member.
episodes.title: Crossfire

episodes.synopsis: Optimus Prime seems to go on a destructive rampage, while MECH unveils their ultimate plan.
episodes.title: Nemesis Prime

episodes.synopsis: Under threat of military tribunal and the potential shutdown of Team Prime, Agent Fowler tries to explain recent events.
episodes.title: Grill

episodes.synopsis: Bulkhead finds himself trapped on a Decepticon warship and caught up in two attempts on Megatron's life.
episodes.title: Armada

episodes.synopsis: When a Decepticon warship becomes sentient and directly threatens humanity, the teens discover they are the only ones who can stop it.
episodes.title: Flying Mind

episodes.synopsis: Team Prime splits up in a race to beat Megatron to the next Iacon relics; the first mission takes Arcee and Bumblebee into New York's subway tunnels.
episodes.title: Tunnel Vision

episodes.synopsis: The second of the relic hunts takes Optimus Prime to the Antarctic, where he gets entangled in shifting alliances between Starscream and Dreadwing.
episodes.title: Triangulation

episodes.synopsis: During the third relic hunt, the disabling of Soundwave's deployer creates a unique opportunity for Ratchet and Wheeljack.
episodes.title: Triage

episodes.synopsis: The final relic in the hunt may prove more deadly to Bulkhead than the Insecticon warriors who are pursuing him.
episodes.title: Toxicity

episodes.synopsis: Miko and Wheeljack embark on a quest for revenge.
episodes.title: Hurt

episodes.synopsis: Arcee is reunited with an old friend, and together they uncover a Decepticon plot engineered by Shockwave.
episodes.title: Out of the Past

episodes.synopsis: Starscream goes on a quest for Red Energon while a new ally joins Team Prime. But is the new Autobot really what he appears to be?
episodes.title: New Recruit

episodes.synopsis: Silas is given a new lease on life, and he approaches Megatron with a plan to join the Decepticon ranks.
episodes.title: The Human Factor

episodes.synopsis: Jack teaches Smokescreen about the human world, and Megatron tries to keep Optimus from finding a fabled weapon that could turn the tide of the war.
episodes.title: Legacy

episodes.synopsis: The Autobots learn of the Omega Keys and the incredible secret they hold, while Megatron takes extreme measures to harness the power of the Primes.
episodes.title: Alpha/Omega

episodes.synopsis: As the race for the Omega Keys grows more desperate, Knock Out harnesses the power of sound, and Starscream uses the power of hyperspeed.
episodes.title: Hard Knocks

episodes.synopsis: When the Decepticons capture him, Smokescreen discovers the final Omega Key and tries to retrieve the other Keys from Megatron himself.
episodes.title: Inside Job

episodes.synopsis: Starscream proposes a truce to Megatron, but Dreadwing threatens to stand in the way of his return.
episodes.title: Patch

episodes.synopsis: The quest for the Omega Lock takes the Autobots and the Decepticons to Cyberton for an epic battle.
episodes.title: Regeneration

episodes.synopsis: The Autobots question Optimus's leadership abilities when his decision regarding Megatron proves troublesome.
episodes.title: Darkest Hour

episodes.synopsis: The season opener finds Optimus struggling to survive while Team Prime tries to reunite after Megatron's victory.
episodes.title: Darkmount, NV

episodes.synopsis: With the return of a key Decepticon, the Autobots' situation becomes even grimmer, and a victory for Wheeljack may ultimately lead to defeat.
episodes.title: Scattered

episodes.synopsis: When the ultimate Autobot hunter is unleashed, will the arrival of a new Autobot be enough to quell the threat?
episodes.title: Prey

episodes.synopsis: Led by a new member, Team Prime launches a desperate assault on the Decepticon citadel.
episodes.title: Rebellion

episodes.synopsis: As the Autobots adjust to new group dynamics within their expanded lineup, the Decepticons concoct a scheme to clone an army of beasts.
episodes.title: Project Predacon

episodes.synopsis: As tension builds within the Wreckers, they find themselves facing the return of the Predacon.
episodes.title: Chain of Command

episodes.synopsis: Unusual alliances abound as Arcee teams with Wheeljack on a mission, and Agent Fowler finds himself in a tight squeeze with Jack's mother.
episodes.title: Plus One

episodes.synopsis: Knock Out and Starscream's rogue experiments lead to disastrous results.
episodes.title: Thirst

episodes.synopsis: When the Predacon reveals a secret of its own, Megatron begins to question its allegiance.
episodes.title: Evolution

episodes.synopsis: The Autobots capture Soundwave. Meanwhile, Megatron resurrects an old plan.
episodes.title: Minus One

episodes.synopsis: While Optimus faces off against Predaking, Megatron mounts a campaign to form a new alliance.
episodes.title: Persuasion

episodes.synopsis: Ratchet finds himself in a series of predicaments as he resumes his experiments on synthetic Energon.
episodes.title: Synthesis

episodes.synopsis: Earth's fate hangs in the balance as the Autobots and the Decepticons march toward their last stand.
episodes.title: Deadlock
